title: The hould of humilitie adioyned to the Castle of courtesie. Compiled by Iames Yates Seruingman. Captious conceipts, good reader doe dismis: and friendly weigh the willing minde of his, which more doth write for pleasure then for praise, whose worthlesse workers are simplie pend alwaies.
author: Yates, James, servingman.
publicationStmtPublisher: Imprinted by Iohn Wolfe, dwelling in Distasse Lane, neere the signe of the Castle,
